```{r load libraries}
library("ggplot2")
library("magrittr")
```

## My plot

```{r load dataset}
yiip.df <- (
  read.csv("yiip_size-exclusion.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = yiip.df, aes(color = complex)) +
  theme_classic() +
  geom_line(aes(x = vol, y = a280))

```
